name: Black Plume Print Cotton Harem Pants
description:
Move in comfort and style with these super-lush harem pants. Simple black cotton is printed with a repeating plume floral motif.  Pockets on the front add simple detail.

These are "one size fits most" pants. They fit most everyone I have seen try them on, from size 4 to size 12. Waist measures 9.5" un-stretched, and up to 42" stretched. Fabric is 40" tall from top seam to bottom of leg.

Whether you are doing yoga on a whim, relaxing on a weekend, spontaneous dinner plans, or traveling, these pants will help you do it in style.

Made in India.

name: Blue and Green Assymetrical Silk Harem Pants
description:
Move in comfort and style with these super-lush harem pants. Soft and flowy silk is printed with a beautifully asymmetrical teal, golden, and blue floral pattern.  Great colors for Fall! Waist band is wide and there is a built-in sash that goes across the front. 

These are "one size fits most" pants. Waist measures 10" un-stretched, and up to 42" stretched. Fabric is 43" tall from top seam to bottom of leg.

Whether you are doing yoga on a whim, relaxing on a weekend, spontaneous dinner plans, or traveling, these pants will help you do it in style. Inspired by fashion from Spain.

Made in India.

name: Red Bold Paisley Print Drop Seam Satin Harem Pants
description:
Move in comfort and style with these super-lush harem pants. This style has the lowest inseam of all the styles, so you can wear it as a "onesie." It is a true harem-pant style! The satin fabric on these has great weight so they hang beautifully. Beautifully bold paisley print in black and blue, with hints of orange, on a bright rich red.

These are "one size fits most" pants. Waist measures 10" un-stretched, and up to 42" stretched. Fabric is 36" tall from top seam to bottom of leg. There is a panel of fabric connecting both legs, so these look like a skirt when worn on the hips. Pull them up to your chest for a jumper look!

Whether you are doing yoga on a whim, relaxing on a weekend, spontaneous dinner plans, or traveling, these pants will help you do it in style. Inspired by fashion from Spain.

Made in India.

name: Gold and Brown Dog Leash Made from Recycled Saris
description:
Strong and stylish, this beautiful dog leash is made from recycled saris from Nepal and India. Saris, large pieces of vibrant and colorful silk, are the traditional clothing of Indian women. Strips of silk are woven together in a "fishtail" style braid. This leash is surprisingly strong and measure approximately 1" wide by 1/4" thick.

These leashes are hand-woven by women in a village near Kathmandu, Nepal. In this part of the world, the majority of women have little independence and financial freedom. The weaving of these leashes allows these women to have financial independence, something that many of us take for granted.

Due to the handmade nature of these leashes, each one is a different length. This leash is 3 ft., 10" long.

10% of the proceeds of the sales of this leash will be donated to V-Day, an international organization dedicated to ending violence against women.

Please see the last picture for other available colors.

name: Celery Green Camel Print Cotton Harem Pants
description:
Move in comfort and style with these super-lush harem pants.  Soothing green cotton with happy black camels.  One size fits most due to the ruched waist band.  Elastic at the bottom of the legs.

These are "one size fits most" pants.  They fit most everyone I have seen try them on, from size 4 to size 12.  Waist measures 10.5" un-stretched, and up to 42" stretched.  Fabric is 37" tall from top seam to bottom of leg.

Whether you are doing yoga on a whim, relaxing on a weekend, spontaneous dinner plans, or traveling, these pants will help you do it in style.

Made in India.

name: Hawaii Bloom Cotton Harem Pants
description:
Move in comfort and style with these super-lush harem pants.  Incredibly bold floral pattern in a cheery mix of pastel pink, yellow, orange, and aqua.  Elastic waist, with lots of extra pleated fabric to create the ultimate harem look.  The bottom of the leg is tapered, and comes to a fashionable "v" on the calf.

These pants are "one size fits most" pants.  They fit most everyone I have seen try them on, from size 4 to size 12.  Waist measures 12" un-stretched, and up to 40" stretched.  Fabric is 36" tall from top seam to bottom of leg.

Whether you are doing yoga on a whim, relaxing on a weekend, spontaneous dinner plans, or traveling, these pants will help you do it in style.  Inspired by fashion from Spain.
